name: Daltry v. Media Electric Light, Heat & Power Company, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Daltry v. Media Electric Light, Heat & Power Co.

judges: Before Mitchell, C. J., Dean, Fell, Mestbezat and Thompson, JJ.
parties: Daltry v. Media Electric Light, Heat & Power Company, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion bt
Mr. Justice Mestbezat,
We have considered the questions raised on this record in the opinion filed this day in the case of James W. Daltry v. Media Electric Light, Heat & Power Company, and for the reasons there given this judgment is affirmed.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Mestbezat,

casebody.head_matter:
Daltry v. Media Electric Light, Heat & Power Company, Appellant.
Argued Feb. 9, 1904.
Appeal, No. 226, Jan. T., 1908, by defendant, from judgment of C. P. Delaware Co., Sept. T., 1901, No. 106, on verdict for plaintiff in case of John L. Daltry v. Media Electric Light, Heat & Power Company.
Before Mitchell, C. J., Dean, Fell, Mestbezat and Thompson, JJ.
Affirmed.
March 14, 1904:
